name: Vehicle Parking Management System profile.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Vehicle Parking Management System Vehicle Parking Management System 1.13"]
description: Vehicle Parking Management System是一个停车管理系统。Vehicle Parking Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/users/profile.php中参数firstname的错误缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
